comments:
I am trying to profile a junit program and when I double click on the execution
statistics tree node the "Execution Statistics" view fails to load with the
following error:

Hi. I cannot reproduce the problem with the latest 4.0 CVS code. I created a
java project a junit test case within, and profile the junit test case with
Execution Time Analysis and Basic Memory Analysis profiling types, Double click
on Execution Time Analysis in Profiling monitor view which opens Execution
Statistic, I don't see any excpetion in either my console or .log file.

Could you provide more information on how you reproduce the exception? Can you
attach the test case you were using also? Thanks.

The problem is reproduciable when percentage is turn on, close the view and
reopen it again.

I am unable to confirm the percentage button doesn't do much when I click it.
Resetting the prespective doesn't make the problem go away. Closing and
reopening the view doesn't fix it either.

fix submitted to TPTP CVS HEAD(4.0).

will add test case to cover the bug
fixed in build TPTP-4.0.0-200507141319, please verify.
